TestGroupDocumentation.Title: minExclusive1 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the on-demand validator of trees got by unmarshalling of a minExclusive-1.xsd based XML document and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a unsignedByte restricted SimpleType with minExclusive value 0.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML unsignedByte minExclusive-1.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls minExclusive-1-1.xml document which specifies valid value 1 for the unsignedByte restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-unsignedByte-minExclusive-1 element, sets the values: 255, 10, 1 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML unsignedByte minExclusive-1.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls minExclusive-1-1.xml document which specifies valid value 1 for the unsignedByte restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-unsignedByte-minExclusive-1 element, sets the values: 0, 256, 400, -1, -400 and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML unsignedByte minExclusive-1.xsd validate dynamically created then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of unsignedByte restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-unsignedByte-minExclusive-1 type, sets the values: 255, 10, 1 and expects the validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML unsignedByte minExclusive-1.xsd validate dynamically created then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of unsignedByte restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-unsignedByte-minExclusive-1 type, sets the values: 0, 256, 400, -1, -400 and expects validation to fail.
